reviewText: This drumming collection is a must have for any drummer.  It is well produced and Terry does a great job of teaching/explaining his techniques.

I've always wanted to get the DVD version of this Melodic Drumming because I originally purchased the VHS Tapes back in 93 or 94. Sad to say, the production of this DVD is very poor.  The sound is not great & sometimes the video flickers as if it was recorded from a bad VHS copy.  Regardless, still this is a great instructional video from Terry Bozzio.  I hope they re master this production one day.
